pages.text: $(li)Mules are passive animals that can only be created breeding a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horse$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/donkey)Donkey$(/l) together.$(br)$(li)They can be tamed right clicking on them to mounts it.$(br)$(li)You will have to repeat this process until hearts appears above the Mule.

$(li)Now, to ride the tamed Mule, you have to right click on it while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) to equip it.$(br)$(li)After that right click on it again, to start to ride it.$(br)$(li)You can walk with it normally, but they jump less than Horsers.$(br)$(li)Tamed Mules can't be bred.
$(li)You can equip a tamed Mule with a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l) right clicking on it while you are holding it in your hand.
$(li)If you shift + right click on it again, you will access to its inventory, where you can save items.
